data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Du, Zhaohui, Li, Houhun, Wang, Shuxia (2011): Taxonomic study of the genus Promalactis Meyrick (Lepidoptera, Oecophoridae) from Hainan Province, China. Zootaxa 3044: 49-64, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.200914
